pmdbs_bulk_rnaseq_analysis.projects:
Array[WomCompositeType {
 samples -> Array[WomCompositeType {
 fastq_I1s -> Array[File]
sample_id -> String
fastq_R1s -> Array[File]+
batch -> String?
fastq_I2s -> Array[File]
fastq_R2s -> Array[File]+ 
}]
project_id -> String
staging_data_buckets -> Array[String]
run_project_cohort_analysis -> Boolean
raw_data_bucket -> String 
}]
pmdbs_bulk_rnaseq_analysis.run_alignment: Boolean (optional, default = true); this and/or 'run_pseudo_mapping_quantification' must be set to true
pmdbs_bulk_rnaseq_analysis.run_star_inde: Boolean (optional, default = false); if set to false, 'star_genome_dir_tar_gz' must be provided
pmdbs_bulk_rnaseq_analysis.run_pseudo_ma: Boolean (optional, default = false); this and/or 'run_alignment_quantification' must be set to true
pmdbs_bulk_rnaseq_analysis.run_salmon_in: Boolean (optional, default = false); if set to false, 'salmon_genome_dir_tar_gz' must be provided
